post.date: Posted: Thu Aug 11, 2005 12:09 am Post subject: Texture challange list
post.author: kat
post.body:
Doom3World texture challange listing

General submission requirements for challenges are:
  • An in game shot of the texture/s, in jpg format.
  • The composite textures: diffuse, specular & normal.
  • An explanation into the process & working insight & other such ramblings.
  • Please do not use any material or images that have a Copyright Â© without the owners permission if it's needed.
  • Images must not be greater than 640 pixel width and try and keep the file size down
===========
challange 1
Crates and barrels
===========
challange 2
Brick, cobbles, stone walls and floors
===========
challange 3
Doorways
===========
challange 4
Organics; rocks, grass, etc.
_________________
Co-Admin - Modelling and modding tutorials and tips
